title: Self-Regulated Learning and Interest-Sustaining Strategies for Online Science Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Learners are professionals in medical/legal/technical fields, utilizing personal devices for flexible learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can create and implement a self-regulated learning plan on an online LMS within three days.
Learners can maintain situational interest at or above 80% for two weeks through inquiry-based activities on science topics.
Learners can improve self-regulated learning strategies by at least three methods based on peer feedback and instructor-customized support.

resources: Customized Learning Analytics Report in LMS

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
